segments.text: What a sloppy mess in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water gushing from the sink, no one bothering to stop it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's drenching the front of the cabinets, pooling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is soaked, and she keeps drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How oblivious can she be to this filthy flood?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are making it worse, climbing around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's dipping into the cookie jar like a thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool's wobbling on the wet floor— gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could slip and smash everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just standing there, begging for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking sweets in this slop— it's all so tacky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a clean garden, mocking the inside mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this careless, dirty scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
